snippet: The nuclear-powered aircraft carrier Ronald Reagan was taking part in a military exercise with South Korea when a pair of Russian bombers flew within one nautical mile of the ship.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The nuclear-powered aircraft carrier Ronald Reagan was taking part in a military exercise with South Korea when a pair of Russian bombers flew within one nautical mile of the ship.

headline.main: South Korea: Russian Jets Approach U.S. Carrier
